name: The Basic Goblin
description: Have you ever seen The Lord of the Ring ? Well, it's that kind of goblin ...

name: The Zombie Warrior
description: Like a normal zombie, but in warrior mode.

name: That Weird Cat in you Neighborhood
description: You know very well what I mean

name: The Stupid Giant
description: He's a little stupid, but he compensate by hitting hard.

name: The Pink Elephant
description: If you see him: put down that bottle immediately !

name: The Rock in the Shoe
description: He's a pain in the ass, isn't he ...

name: The Dead Fish
description: Don't trust his innocent smile. He's more dangerous that he looks ... or not in fact.

name: The Internet Explorer
description: Everyone has forgotten him, but the hour of his vengeance has finally come ! Tremble before his (relative) power !
